contemplacio Ffowre thowsand sex vndryd foure ?ere I telle Man ffor his offens and ffowle foly Hath loyn ?erys in Ã¾e peynes of helle And were wurthy to ly Ã¾er-in endlesly But thanne xulde perysche ?our grete mercye good lord haue on man pyte haue mende of Ã¾e prayour seyd by Ysaie lete mercy meke Ã¾in hyest mageste. wolde god Ã¾ou woldyst breke Ã¾in hefne myghtye and com down here in to erth And levyn ?erys thre and threttye thyn famyt ffolke with Ã¾i fode to fede To staunche Ã¾i thryste lete Ã¾i syde blede ffor erste wole not be mad redempcion Cum vesyte vs in Ã¾is tyme of nede of Ã¾i careful creaturys haue compassyon. A woo to vs wrecchis of wrecchis be ffor god hath haddyd ssorwe to sorwe I prey Ã¾e lord Ã¾i sowlys com se How Ã¾ei ly and sobbe ffor syknes and sorwe With Ã¾i blyssyd blood ffrom balys hem borwe thy careful creaturys cryenge in captyvyte A tary not gracyous lord tyl it be to-morwe The devyl hath dysceyved hem be hys iniquite. A quod Jeremye who xal gyff wellys to myn eynes Ãat I may wepe bothe day and nyght to se oure bretheryn in so longe peynes here myschevys Amende may Ã¾i mech myght As gret as Ã¾e se lord was Adamys contryssyon ryght Ffrom oure hed is falle Ã¾e crowne Man is comeryd in synne I crye to Ã¾i syght Gracyous lord Gracyous lord Gracyous lord come downe. Virtutes Lord plesyth it Ã¾in hy? domynacion On man Ã¾at Ã¾ou made to haue pyte Patryarchys and prophetys han made supplycacion oure offyse is to presente here prayerys to the Aungelys Archaungelys we thre Ã¾at ben in Ã¾e fyrst ierarchie Ffor man to Ã¾in hy mageste Mercy mercy mercy we crye. The Aungel lord Ã¾ou made so gloryous whos synne hath mad hym a devyl in helle he mevyd man to be so contraryous man repentyd and he in his obstynacye doth dwelle Hese grete males good lord repelle And take man on to Ã¾i grace lete Ã¾i mercy make hym with Aungelys dwelle of locyfere to restore Ã¾e place. Pater Propter miseriam inopum nunc exurgam et gemitum pauperum nunc exurgam Ffor Ã¾e wretchydnes of Ã¾e nedy And Ã¾e porys lamentacion now xal I ryse Ã¾at am Almyghty tyme is come of reconsyliacion My prophetys with prayers haue made supplicacion my contryte creaturys crye all for comforte All myn Aungellys in hefne with-owte cessacion they crye Ã¾at grace to man myght exorte. Veritas Lord I am Ã¾i dowtere trewth Ã¾ou wylt se I be not lore thyn vnkynde creaturys to saue were rewthe the offens of man hath grevyd Ã¾e sore Whan Adam had synnyd Ã¾ou seydest Ã¾ore Ã¾at he xulde deye and go to helle And now to blysse hym to resstore twey contraryes mow not to-gedyr dwelle. Thy trewthe lord xal leste with-owtyn ende I may in no wyse ffro Ã¾e go Ã¾at wretche Ã¾at was to Ã¾e so vnkende he may not haue to meche wo He dyspysyd Ã¾e and plesyd Ã¾i ffo Ã¾ou art his creatour and he is Ã¾i creature Ã¾ou hast lovyd trewthe it is seyd evyr mo Ã¾erfore in peynes lete hym evyr more endure. Misericordia O Ffadyr of mercy and god of comforte Ã¾at counsell us in eche trybulacion lete ?our dowtere mercy to ?ow resorte And on man Ã¾at is myschevyd haue compassyon hym grevyth fful gretly his transgressyon All hefne and erthe crye ffor mercy Me semyth Ã¾er xuld be non excepcion ther prayers ben offeryd so specyally. Threwth Sseyth she hath evyr be than I graunt it wel she hath be so and Ã¾ou seyst endlesly Ã¾at mercy Ã¾ou hast kept ffor man than mercyabyl lorde kepe us bothe to Thu seyst Veritas mea et misericordia mea cum ipso Suffyr not Ã¾i sowlys than in sorwe to slepe Ã¾at helle hownde Ã¾at hatyth Ã¾e byddyth hym ho Ã¾i love man no lengere lete hym kepe. Justicia Mercy me merveylyth what ?ow movyth ?e know wel I am ?our systere ryghtwysnes God is ryghtful and ryghtffulnes lovyth man offendyd hym Ã¾at is endles Ther fore his endles punchement may nevyr sees Also he forsoke his makere Ã¾at made hym of clay And Ã¾e devyl to his mayster he ches xulde he be savyd nay nay nay. As wyse as is god he wolde A be this was Ã¾e Abhomynabyl presumpcion it is seyd ?e know wel Ã¾is of me Ã¾at Ã¾e ryghtwysnes of god hath no diffynicion Therffore late Ã¾is be oure conclusyon he Ã¾at sore synnyd ly stylle in sorwe he may nevyr make A seyth be reson whoo myght thanne thens hym borwe. Misericordia Systyr Ryghtwysnes ?e Are to vengeabyl Endles synne god endles may restore Above all hese werkys god is mercyabyl Ã¾ow he for-sook god be synne be feyth he for-sook hym never Ã¾e more And Ã¾ow he presumyd nevyr so sore ?e must consyder Ã¾e frelnes of mankende lerne and ?e lyst Ã¾is is goddys lore Ã¾e mercy of god is with-owtyn ende. Pax To spare ?our speches systerys it syt It is not onest in vertuys to ben dyscencion the pes of god ovyr comyth all wytt Ã¾ow trewth and ryght sey grett reson ?ett mercy seyth best to my pleson ffor yf mannys sowle xulde abyde in helle be-twen God and man evyr xulde be dyvysyon And than myght not I pes dwelle. Therefore me semyth best ?e thus Acorde than hefne and erthe ?e xul qweme putt bothe ?our sentens in oure lorde And in his hy? wysdam lete hym deme This is most syttynge me xulde seme And lete se how we ffowre may all A-byde Ã¾at mannys sowle it xulde perysche it wore sweme or Ã¾at ony of vs ffro othere xulde dyvyde. Veritas In trowthe here-to I consente I wole prey oure lord it may so be. Justicia I Ryghtwysnes am wele contente Ffor in hym is very equyte. Misericordia And I mercy ffro Ã¾is counsel wole not fle tyl wysdam hath seyd I xal ses. Pax Here is god now here is vnyte hefne and erth is plesyd with pes. ffilius I thynke Ã¾e thoughtys of pes and nowth of wykkydnes this I deme to ses ?our contraversy If Adam had not deyd peryschyd had ryghtwysnes And Also trewth had be lost Ã¾er-by Terrewth and ryght wolde chastyse ffoly ?iff a-nother deth come not mercy xulde perysch Ã¾an pes were exyled ffynyaly So tweyn dethis must be ?ow fowre to cherysch. But he Ã¾at xal deye ?e must knawe Ã¾at in hym may ben non iniquyte Ã¾at helle may holde hym be no lawe But Ã¾at he may pas at hese lyberte Qwere swyche on his prevyde and se And hese deth for mannys deth xal be redempcion All hefne and erth seke now ?e Plesyth it ?ow Ã¾is conclusyon. Veritas I trowthe haue sowte Ã¾e erthe with-owt and with-inne and In sothe Ã¾er kan non be fownde Ã¾at is of o day byrth with-owte synne nor to Ã¾at deth wole be bownde. Misericordia I mercy haue ronne Ã¾e hevynly Regyon rownde and Ã¾er is non of Ã¾at charyte Ã¾at ffor man wole suffre A deddly wounde I I can nott wete how Ã¾is xal be. Justicia Sure I can fynde non sufficyent Ffor servauntys vn-profytable we be ech on He love nedyth to be ful Ardent that for man to helle wolde gon. Pax That god may do is non but on Ã¾er fore Ã¾is is Pesys A-vyse he Ã¾at ?aff Ã¾is counsell lete hym ?eve Ã¾e comforte A-lon Ffor Ã¾e conclusyon in hym of all Ã¾ese lyse. Ffilius It peyneth me Ã¾at man I mad Ã¾at is to seyn peyne I must suffre fore A counsel of Ã¾e trinite must be had Whiche of vs xal man restore. Pater In ?our wysdam son man was mad thore And in wysdam was his temptacion Ã¾erfor sone sapyens ?e must ordeyn here-fore and se how of man may be salvacion. Filius Ffadyr he Ã¾at xal do Ã¾is must be both god and man lete me se how I may were Ã¾at wede And syth in my wysdam he be-gan I am redy to do Ã¾is dede. Spiritus Sanctus I the holy gost of ?ow tweyn do procede this charge I wole take on me I love to ?our lover xal ?ow lede Ã¾is is Ã¾e Assent of oure vnyte. Misericordia Now is Ã¾e loveday mad of us fowre fynialy now may we leve in pes as we were wonte Misericordia et veritas obviauerunt sibi Justicia et pax osculate sunt et hic osculabunt pariter omnes. Pater Ffrom vs god Aungel Gabryel Ã¾ou xalt be sende In to Ã¾e countre of Galyle the name of Ã¾e cyte Nazareth is kende to A mayd w[e]ddyd to A man is she Of whom Ã¾e name is joseph se of Ã¾e hous of davyd bore The name of Ã¾e mayd ffre Is Mary Ã¾at xal Al Restore. Ffilius Say Ã¾at she is with-owte wo and ful of grace And Ã¾at I Ã¾e son of Ã¾e godhed of here xal be bore Hy?e Ã¾e Ã¾ou were there A pace ellys we xal be there the be-ffore I haue so grett hast to be man thore In Ã¾at mekest and purest virgyne Sey here she xal restore Of ?ow Aungellys Ã¾e grett Ruyne. Spiritus Sanctus And if she Aske Ã¾e how it myth be telle here I Ã¾e holy gost xal werke al this Sche xal be savyd thorwe oure vnyte In tokyn here bareyn cosyn Elyzabeth is Qwyk with childe in here grett Age i-wys Sey here to vs is no thynge impossyble Here body xal be so ful-fylt with blys Ãat she xal sone thynke Ã¾is sownde credyble. Gabriel In thyn hey inbassett lord I xal go It xal be do with a thought be-holde now lord I go here to I take my fflyth and byde nowth Ave maria gratia plena Dominus tecum. Heyl fful of grace god is with the Amonge All women blyssyd art thu here Ã¾is name Eva is turnyd Aue Ã¾at is to say with-owte sorwe ar ?e now. Thow sorwe in ?ow hath no place ?ett of joy lady ?e nede more Therfore I Adde And sey Fful of grace Ffor so Ful of grace was nevyr non bore ?ett who hath grace he nedyth kepyng sore therfore I sey god is with the Whiche xal kepe ?ow endlesly thore So amonge All women blyssyd are ?e. Maria A mercy god Ã¾is is a mervelyous herynge In Ã¾e Aungelys wordys I am trobelyd her I thynk how may be Ã¾is gretynge Aungelys dayly to me doth Aper But not in Ã¾e lyknes of man Ã¾at is my fer And Also thus hy?ly to comendyd be and am most vn-wurthy I can-not Answere grett shamfastnes and grett dred is in me. Gabryel Mary in Ã¾is take ?e no drede Ffor At God grace ffownde haue ?e ?e xal conceyve in ?our wombe in dede A childe Ã¾e sone of Ã¾e trynyte His name of ?ow jhesu clepyd xal be He xal be grett Ã¾e son of Ã¾e hyest clepyd of kende and of his ffadyr davyd Ã¾e lord xal ?eve hym Ã¾e se Reynyng in Ã¾e hous of jacob of which regne xal be no ende. Maria Aungel I sey to ?ow In what manere of wyse xal Ã¾is be Ffor knowyng of man I haue non now I haue evyr more kept and xal my virginyte I dowte not Ã¾e wordys ?e han seyd to me But I Aske how it xal be do. Gabryel The holy gost xal come fro A-bove to the and Ã¾e vertu of hym hyest xal schadu Ã¾e so. Ther fore Ã¾at holy gost of Ã¾e xal be bore he xal be clepyd Ã¾e son of god sage And se Elyzabeth ?our cosyn thore She hath conseyvid A son in hyre Age This is Ã¾e sexte monyth of here passage? Of here Ã¾at clepyd was bareyn no thynge is impossyble to goddys vsage they thynkyth longe to here what ?e wyl seyn here Ã¾e Aungel makyth a lytyl restynge and mary be-holdyth hym and Ã¾e Aungel seyth Mary come of and haste the And take hede in thyn entent Whow Ã¾e holy gost blyssyd he be A-bydyth Ã¾in answere and Ã¾in assent Thorwe wyse werke of dyvinyte the secunde persone verament is mad man by fraternyte With-inne Ã¾i self in place present. Fferther more take hede Ã¾is space Whow all Ã¾e blyssyd spyrytys of vertu Ã¾at are in hefne by-ffore goddys face And all Ã¾e gode levers and trew That Are here in Ã¾is erthely place thyn owyn kynrede Ã¾e sothe ho knew And Ã¾e chosyn sowlys Ã¾is tyme of grace Ã¾at Are in helle and byde rescu. As Adam Abraham and davyd in fere And many othere of good reputacion Ã¾at Ã¾in Answere desyre to here and Ã¾in Assent to Ã¾e incarnacion In which Ã¾ou standyst As persevere of All man-kende savacion Gyff me myn Answere now lady dere to All these creaturys comfortacion. Maria With All mekenes I clyne to Ã¾is A-corde Bowynge down my face with All benyngnyte Se here Ã¾e hand-mayden of oure lorde Aftyr Ã¾i worde be it don to me. Gabryel Gramercy my lady ffre Gramercy of ?our Answere on hyght Gramercy of ?our grett humylyte Gramercy ?e lanterne off lyght. here Ã¾e holy gost discendit with iij bemys to our lady the sone of be godhed nest with iij bemys to Ã¾e holy gost the fadyr godly with iij bemys to Ã¾e sone And so entre All thre to here bosom and Mary seyth Maria A now I ffele in my body be parfyte god and parfyte man havyng Al schappe of chyldly carnalyte Evyn Al at onys Ã¾us god be-gan. Nott takynge ffyrst o membyr and sythe A-nother but parfyte childhod ?e haue A-non of ?our hand-mayden now ?e haue mad ?our modyr With-owte peyne in Fflesche and bon Thus conceyved nevyr woman non Ã¾at evyr was beynge in Ã¾is lyff O myn hyest ffadyr in ?our tron It is worthy ?our son now my son haue A prerogatyff. I can not telle what joy what blysse now I fele in my body Aungel Gabryel I thank ?ow for thys most mekely recomende me to my faderys mercy To haue be Ã¾e modyr of god fful lytyl wend I Now myn cosyn Elyzabeth ffayn wold I se how sche hath conseyvid as ?e dede specyfy Now blyssyd be Ã¾e hy? trynyte. Gabryel Ffare weyl turtyl goddys dowtere dere Ffare wel goddys modyr I Ã¾e honowre Ffare wel goddys sustyr and his pleynge fere Ffare wel goddys chawmere and his bowre. Maria Ffare wel Gabryel specyalye Ffare wel goddys masangere expresse I thank ?ow for ?our traveyl hye Gramercy of ?our grett goodnes. And namely of ?our comfortabyl massage Ffor I vndyrstande by inspyracion Ã¾at ?e knowe by syngulere preuylage most of my sonys incarnacion I pray ?ow take it in to vsage be A custom ocupacion to vesyte me ofte be mene passage ?our presence is my comfortacion. Gabriel At ?our wyl lady so xal it be ?e gentyllest of blood and hyest of kynrede Ã¾at reynyth in erth in ony degre be pryncypal incheson of Ã¾e god-hede. I comende me on to ?ow Ã¾ou trone of Ã¾e trinyte O mekest mayde now Ã¾e modyr of jhesu qwen of hefne lady of erth and empres of helle be ?e socour to All synful Ã¾at wole to ?ow sew Thour ?our body beryth Ã¾e babe oure blysse xal renew to ?ow modyr of mercy most mekely I recomende and as I began I ende with An Ave new Enjonyd hefne and erth with Ã¾at I Ascende. Angeli cantando istam sequenciam. Ave maria gratia plena Dominus tecum uirgo sesena
